## viewport variable

Produces a 2x3 viewport matrix to transform projected coordinates to screen space.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
viewport: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, left: number, right: number, bottom: number, top: number) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
